# scale-tag



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Usage

### Tag

### Default

<scale-tag>
  Label
</scale-tag>

### Pill

<scale-tag pill>
  Label
</scale-tag>

### Link

<scale-tag href="http://example.com">
  Label
</scale-tag>



## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                      | Type                                     | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | -------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `customClass` | `custom-class` | (optional) Tag class             | `string`                                 | `''`        |
| `href`        | `href`         | (optional) Tag on an <a> element | `string`                                 | `''`        |
| `pill`        | `pill`         | (optional) Tag pill              | `boolean`                                | `false`     |
| `styles`      | --             | (optional) Injected jss styles   | `StyleSheet<string \| number \| symbol>` | `undefined` |
| `variant`     | `variant`      | (optional) Tag variant           | `string`                                 | `''`        |
